verses.name: Mark 10:30
verses.text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time, houses, and brethren, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and lands, with persecutions; and in the world to come eternal life.

verses.name: Mark 10:31
verses.text: But many that are first shall be last; and the last first.

verses.name: Mark 10:32
verses.text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem; and Jesus went before them: and they were amazed; and as they followed, they were afraid. And he took again the twelve, and began to tell them what things should happen unto him,
